P-247.name: Damaged Item Return Policy
P-247.description: Full refund for items damaged during shipping
conditions: Item must be damaged upon arrival
Must be reported within 30 days of delivery
Photo evidence may be required for high-value items
actions: Full refund to original payment method
Prepaid return label provided at no cost
Replacement option available if item still in stock

P-189.name: Late Delivery Compensation
P-189.description: Compensation for guaranteed deliveries that arrive late
conditions: Item was not marked as delivered on time
actions: Refund of shipping charges if applicable
One-month Prime membership extension for repeated delays

P-301.name: 30-Day Return Policy
P-301.description: Standard return policy for most items
conditions: Item returned within 30 days of delivery
Item must be in original condition
Original packaging required for some items
Must include all accessories and documentation
actions: Partial refund may apply for opened items
Return shipping cost may be deducted
Restocking fee may apply to certain categories
P-301.timeframe: Refund processed within 5-7 business days after receiving return

P-156.name: Wrong Item Shipped
P-156.description: Policy for incorrect items shipped to customer
conditions: Item must be unused and in original packaging
actions: Prepaid return label for wrong item
Full refund if replacement not desired
Expedited shipping for replacement at no cost

P-428.name: Missing Package Investigation
P-428.description: Process for packages marked delivered but not received
conditions: Package marked as delivered by carrier
Must wait 48 hours after delivery date
actions: Immediate refund for Prime members after 48 hours
File police report for high-value items
